fields.title: Direct contract or single bid received
fields.description: Tender was direct or had a single bidder.  Note: in the context of an emergency direct contracts can be justified.

fields.title: Contract value is higher or lower than average for this item category
fields.description: Contract value is threshold distance from mean for item category.  Flag contract if price is higher than average for a particular item category.

fields.title: Supplier wins contract for item or service types it is unlikely to have, or higher quantitities of items or services it is unlikely to be able to provide
fields.description: The items won do not match the description or quantity historically provided by supplier

fields.title: Contract value is higher than tender value
fields.description: Contract value is higher than tender value

fields.title: Contract is awarded to supplier that has won a disproportionate number of contracts of the same type
fields.description: Supplier wins 2+ (higher than average value or number of contracts can be used) contracts from same buyer, of similar size and similar item via same procurement type

fields.title: Contract is awarded to supplier that has similar information (address, number, legal representative) to other suppliers for the same buyer
fields.description: Supplier 1 info matches supplier 2 info for the same buyer.

fields.title: Concentration
fields.description: Supplier who has signed X percent or more of their contracts with the same buyer (wins tenders from the same buyer);

fields.title: High price dynamics
fields.description: The difference between the expected purchase price and the final (contract) value exceeds 20 percent;

fields.title: Framework agreement with several tenderers (with less than 3 tenderers participating)
High contract value
fields.description: High contract value can be considered as a risk indicator
